t:
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart,
But the very next day, you gave it
                                                          back.

So anyway, this year, I've sharpened my knives, and I'm coming to take yours.
c:
Not for revenge, but to carve my name on your heart, intertwined forever, like mistletoe beneath the moon.



#revenge #betrayal #heartbreak #determination #christmas #loss #emotions #love
